content: previously published in crochet a day calendar simple ladies newsboy cap brim is strengthened with a piece of plastic canvas cap is worked entirely in single_crochet and is worked in the round and in row thank you to my testers knitinbliss mmcrochet and honeystalks if you have any questions or comments or just want to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs thanks
